flawed_nl_solution:
June had 76 stickers and was given 25 from her grandparents so she had 76 + 25 = <<76+25=106>>106 stickers
Bonnie had 63 stickers and was given 25 from her grandparents so she had 63 + 25 = <<63+25=88>>88 stickers
June had 106 stickers and Bonnie had 88 stickers so together, they had 106 + 88 = <<106+88=194>>194 stickers
#### 194

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 101, not 106. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
